title: N8N API Workflow Creation Error
description: During N8N Humanitix workflow creation, N8N API rejected workflow deployment with error 'request/body must NOT have additional properties'. Root cause: Extra metadata fields in workflow JSON including staticData: null, meta: null, pinData: {}, versionId: null, triggerCount: 0, tags: []. N8N API validation requires clean workflow structure without these optional metadata fields. Required multiple deployment attempts and debugging to identify cause.

solution.description: Successfully resolved by creating clean workflow versions without extra metadata properties. Removed staticData, meta, pinData, versionId, triggerCount, and tags fields from workflow JSON. Created workflow-1-clean.json and workflow-2-clean.json files with only essential workflow structure (name, nodes, connections, settings). Clean workflows deployed successfully to N8N with IDs CK9JWj9aapFu26lH and XQ8bFr8gSIOQjWC5.
